verses.name: 1 Kings 2:13
verses.text: And Adonijah the son of Haggith came to Bath–sheba the mother of Solomon. And she said, Comest thou peaceably? And he said, Peaceably.

verses.name: 1 Kings 2:14
verses.text: He said moreover, I have somewhat to say unto thee. And she said, Say on.

verses.name: 1 Kings 2:15
verses.text: And he said, Thou knowest that the kingdom was mine, and that all Israel set their faces on me, that I should reign: howbeit the kingdom is turned about, and is become my brother’s: for it was his from the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Kings 2:16
verses.text: And now I ask one petition of thee, deny me not. And she said unto him, Say on.
